sentences.english: Command, huang feng call third reconnaissance teams, have been slow to respond.
sentences.chinese: 司令部內，黃鳴鋒呼叫第三偵察小隊，遲遲沒有迴應。

sentences.english: The quick, decisive victory that Napoleon expected never happened.
sentences.chinese: 拿破崙期盼着的速決速勝遲遲沒有發生。

sentences.english: Mr Wang didn't and the meeting had to be .
sentences.chinese: 王老師遲遲未到，會議只好推遲。

sentences.english: He always replied rather tardily to my letters.
sentences.chinese: 他對我的信總是遲遲不作答覆。

sentences.english: The government has not yet announced the punishment of Zhang and his company.
sentences.chinese: 政府對張悟本和悟本堂公司的處罰遲遲未至。

sentences.english: Mr Clemente mixes his rounds with courteous visits to borrowers who have fallen behind on their payments.
sentences.chinese: 他同時也對遲遲未繳貸款的人家做有禮貌的訪問。

sentences.english: Such events are very interesting, but the suspense of them cannot last long.
sentences.chinese: 這種事很令人好奇，可是謎底也不會遲遲解不開。

sentences.english: But it hasn t happened to the people find joy.
sentences.chinese: 但衆人發現歡喜卻遲遲未到。

sentences.english: The Government has been dilatory in condemning the outrage.
sentences.chinese: 政府遲遲才譴責是次暴行。

sentences.english: Occasionally the accumulation of toxin, also be the reason that weight does not fall tardy .
sentences.chinese: 有時候毒素的累積，也正是體重遲遲不降的原因。

sentences.english: In the winter time the Rat slept a great deal, retiring early and rising late.
sentences.chinese: 冬令時節，河鼠很貪睡，早早就上牀，遲遲纔起來。

sentences.english: On Monday, he made an overdue start on that.
sentences.chinese: 而直到星期一，他才遲遲逾期開始。

sentences.english: Thank you for your leaving late in the afternoon !
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你在暮色四合時遲遲離去。

sentences.english: The Presidential inauguration came, and still no decision of the court;
sentences.chinese: 總統就職儀式進行過了，但法庭裁決遲遲未定。

sentences.english: I musing late in the autumn day, gazing off southward.
sentences.chinese: 我在秋日裏沉思遲遲，望斷南凝汽。

sentences.english: you will lose your chance if you delay your action.
sentences.chinese: 如果遲遲不採取行動，你就會坐失良機。
